entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 04:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 25 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
